headline: Intuitive Announces Expanded Indications for da Vinci SP
summary: FDA clearance expands da Vinci SP indications to include inguinal hernia repair, cholecystectomy, and appendectomySUNNYVALE, Calif., Dec. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Intuitive (NASDAQ: ISRG), a global technology leader in minimally invasive care and the pioneer of robotic-assisted surgery, today announced that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has cleared the da Vinci Single Port (SP) surgical system for use in inguinal hernia repair, cholecystectomy, and appendectomy procedures. Thes
